title: Kapsule K360
description: This Kapsule offers a 360Â° immersive experience in an interactive world, developed with React and Three.js. Thanks to R3F, 3D elements are integrated into a panoramic image, enriched with points of interest allowing access to additional content (information, quizzes, etc.). The goal is to provide a smooth, educational, and engaging immersive experience.

title: Kapsule K-Hoot
description: Creation of a Kapsule K-Hoot for the K-Hubs platform, inspired by Kahoot!. The application offers three dynamic quiz modes aimed at making learning more fun and interactive.

title: Refactoring
description: In a team of 5, we took over a mobile application and its Symfony back office, dedicated to internship management. Objectives: technical overhaul, bug fixing, and adding new features to improve user experience and overall performance.

title: PhareAway
description: Web project aimed at promoting the heritage of French lighthouses through an interactive map and unique escape games. Each lighthouse has its own scripted mini-game, allowing users to discover its history and features in a fun way. Completed in a team of 8.

title: A relative's portfolio
description: Creation of a modern and high-performance portfolio in Next.js. I designed an intuitive interface, optimized SEO via SSR, integrated interactive animations, and reusable components. This project allowed me to refine my front-end skills while meeting my client's needs precisely.

title: Chief Arena
description: Project manager of a team of 6 for the development of a JavaFX application dedicated to organizing cooking competitions. The app includes planning tools, participant management, and event tracking. I coordinated the team, supervised development, and ensured technical and functional consistency of the project.

title: Other Small Student Projects
description: Participation in several academic projects, including the design of Java applications, UML modeling, use of Docker, and work in C/C++, Bash, and PostgreSQL. These experiences helped me strengthen my technical skills and work on diverse challenges in a team setting. All projects are available on my GitHub.
